application.name: Owncloud Desktop Client
application.summary: The ownCloud desktop client, lets you sync directly to your ownCloud server

description.p: Owncloud-client enables you to connect to your private ownCloud Server. With it you can create folders in your home directory, and keep the contents of those folders synced with your ownCloud server. Simply copy a file into the directory and the ownCloud Client does the rest.
